name: Ra.One: The Game
description:
___________________________________________________________________________________
Ra.One: The Game
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_______________________________________________________________________________
1.Introduction
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The game Ra.One is a multiplayer(1vs1) platformer action adventure game
where both players can play with their respective characters Ra.One 
(controlled from right, arrow keys) and G.One (controlled from WSAD), 
from the same keyboard.

The game stars automatically from a defaul level, and generates
 random levels afterwards from a  list of 3~4 levels and some bonus levels
 which appear rarely based on your gameplay style. 

__________________________________________________________________________________
2.Controls
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The game characters can be controlled from WSAD for G.One and (arrow keys)
for Ra.One, from same keyboard.

__________________________________________________________________  
Controls(Ra.One)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
UP arrow key - JUMP
DOWN arrow key - SHOOT bullets
LEFT arrow key - MOVE left
RIGHT arrow key - MOVE right
RIGHT CTRL key -  DROP BOMB on another player
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
___________________________________________________________________  
Controls(G.One)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
W key -   JUMP
S key -   SHOOT bullets
A key -   MOVE left
D key -   MOVE right
LEFT CTRL key -      DROP BOMB on another player
____________________________________________________________________ 

___________________________________________________________________________________
3.Menu
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The game has only pause menu accessed by Esc(escape key) which stops the 
player movement and a message is shown to hit BACKSPACE(<-) key to end the 
game. 

** The game starts from fullscreen mode, so you can access to windowed mode 
by pressing ALT+TAB on windows.

_____________________________________________________________________________________
_____________________________________________________________________________________

This game was made using the Game Maker Studio engine. 

_____________________________________________________________________________________
NOTE: This game is made just for fun, it has no actual relation with the 
      actual movie Ra.One, and all the soundtracs used in the game are 
  downloaded from the internet.
